dogs.name: German Shepherd
description: The German Shepherd Dog is a large, agile, muscular dog of noble character and high intelligence.It has been used in many other types of work, including disability assistance, search-and-rescue, police work, and warfare. It is commonly kept as a companion dog.

dogs.name: Rottweiler
description: The Rottweiler is a breed of domestic dog, regarded as medium-to-large or large.Rottweilers are now also used as search and rescue dogs, guard dogs, and police dogs.

dogs.name: Siberian Husky
description: The Siberian Husky is a medium-sized working sled dog breed.The Siberian Husky is typically kept as a house pet, though they are still frequently used as sled dogs by competitive and recreational mushers.

dogs.name: Doberman
description: The Dobermann, or Doberman Pinscher in the U.S. and Canada, is a medium-large breed of domestic dog.Dobermanns are known to be intelligent, alert, and tenaciously loyal companions and guard dogs.

dogs.name: Bulldog
description: Also know as the English Bulldog or British Bulldog,The Bulldog is a British breed of dog of mastiff type.It is a medium-sized, muscular dog commonly kept as pets.

dogs.name: Golden Retriever
description: The Golden Retriever is a Scottish breed of retriever dog of medium size.Golden Retrievers are outgoing, trustworthy, and eager-to-please family dogs, and relatively easy to train.These energetic, powerful gundogs enjoy outdoor play.

dogs.name: Labrador Retriever
description: The Labrador Retriever, or simply Labrador, is a British breed of retriever gun dog.The Labrador is friendly, energetic, and playful.It was bred as a sporting and hunting dog but is widely kept as a companion dog. It may also be trained as a guide or assistance dog, or for rescue or therapy work.

dogs.name: Alaskan Malamute
description: The Alaskan Malamut is a large breed of dog that was originally bred for its strength and endurance, to haul heavy freight as a sled dog, and as a hound.Malamutes are very fond of people, a trait that makes them particularly sought-after family dogs, but unreliable watchdogs as they do not tend to bark.

dogs.name: Chihuahua
description: The Chihuahua (Chihuahue√±o) is a Mexican breed of toy dog. It is named for the Mexican state of Chihuahua and is among the smallest of all dog breeds.It is usually kept as a companion animal or for showing.

dogs.name: Dachshund
description: The dachshund  also known as the wiener dog, badger dog, doxie, and sausage dog, is a short-legged, long-bodied, hound-type dog breed.The dachshund was bred to scent, chase, and flush out badgers and other burrow-dwelling animals.They are rated in the intelligence of dogs as an average working dog with a persistent ability to follow trained commands 50% of the time or more.

dogs.name: Samoyed
description: The Samoyed is a breed of medium-sized herding dogs with thick, white, double-layer coats.They are known to be used in expeditions in both Arctic and Antarctic regions and have a friendly and agreeable disposition.

dogs.name: Shiba Inu
description: The Shiba Inu  is a breed of hunting dog from Japan.A small, alert, and agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain and hiking trails, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.
